title: First look: Inside Norwegian Cruise Line's giant new ship
text: BING NEWS: First look: Inside Norwegian Cruise Line's giant new ship The 164,600-ton Norwegian Escape is Norwegian Cruise Line's largest ship ever. (Photo: ©2015 Michel Verdure - www.verd) ABOARD THE NORWEGIAN ESCAPE — What's it like on Norwegian Cruise Line's newest ship, the Norwegian Escape?
